testcase.classname: Testing the Post, Put and Delete Pets endpoint
testcase.name: Create, update and delete new pet with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given I securely send requests to '${envProperties:petstore.url}'...........passed When I send a 'POST' request to '/pet' based on 'schemas/createPet.json' as 'json' with:.passed Then the service response status must be '200'..............................passed Then I save element '$' in environment variable 'response'..................passed And 'response' matches the following cases:.................................passed And I save element '$.id' in environment variable 'ID_NEW_PET'..............passed When I send a 'PUT' request to '/pet' based on 'schemas/updatePet.json' as 'json' with:.passed Then the service response status must be '200'..............................passed Then I save element '$' in environment variable 'response'..................passed And 'response' matches the following cases:.................................passed When I send a 'DELETE' request to '/pet/${ID_NEW_PET}'......................passed Then the service response status must be '200'..............................passed Then I save element '$' in environment variable 'response'..................passed And 'response' matches the following cases:.................................passed
